website_summaries.verdict: Effective, comfortable, brightly colored, and extremely easy to fit on your horse, and if you need a straightforward and simple solution, these inexpensive nylon rope halters might be just what you’re looking for.
pros: Available in purple, black, and royal blue
Easy to put on and remove
cons: Its bright colors may fade over time when constantly exposed to direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: For the price its a nice halter. Runs large!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. It's quite stiff and to large for my smaller horse. The ends are not clipped or crimped together like most halters are but instead have a soft rubber almost like electrical tape. I'm not sure if I like this or not. I have seen horses get hit in the eye with the metal before but not sure how well the plastic will hold up. You get what you pay for. For the price...it's a nice halter.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Brandmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this rope halter, yesterday.. It fits my big thoroughbred pretty well.. The rope is stiff, but I'm hoping it'll soften with use. I love the color, a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It’s really not a bad halter
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products you’re supposed to be able to order one one day can you get the next day, it took one week to get to me. I only gave it three stars because I didn’t like what looks like electrical tape where the rope ends meet.The halter itself is not bad, for ten dollars it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: ALG

customer_reviews.title: Good halter for the money - ends are not fastened well
customer_reviews.text: This halter seems durable. It is easy to use. I am not happy with the end of it where the two ropes come together. It should've been surged better and not just wrapped with what seems to be electrical tape. It's good enough for the price, but I have had to melt the ends together better and re-wrap. So, beware of that.
customer_reviews.author: hollythehun

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Halter wore in two pieces right where I tie the loop when the halter is on the horse. Very disappointed in this halter as all of my other Tough 1 products have been a great value and long lasting. This halter did not last 6 months before it was garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Ferry

customer_reviews.title: OK But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff, especially in colder weather. Difficult to work with. I like the ones that come with a lead rope. This one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: pibble mom

customer_reviews.title: Thicker rope, would prefer it to be thinner
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money! I’ve used this halter to train my 4 y/o but I just wish the rope was thinner. Great value for your money though!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good Halter - Okay for Pasture/Leading Use
customer_reviews.text: Halter was okay, but I don't think I'd trust it for a crazy horse that likes to tug on a lead line (at least until it's worn in). Very hard to manipulate at first (hard to get the knot where you want it so it doesn't rub or come undone). Color was very bright. After it was a little worn in, it fit much better & felt much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Z.

customer_reviews.title: Tough 1 the only halter to buy
customer_reviews.text: Tough 1 makes a great halter. Very durable. I only purchase Tough 1 halters and have never had one fail.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Showler

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mule due to her large head. This fits well, is well made and hold up well to a rubbing, dirt rolling pigpen of a mule.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Sturdy poly rope halter that is large enough for a large horse. This halter will last until I lose it. The color is exactly as represented. I am excited to find a less expensive outlet for quality horse accessories.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to do business with and very well made and great colors and was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: Well to start I ordered hunter green. I received blue but the bag said green lol. The halter is just ok. Doesn’t look like it will last long. Spend bit more and buy a better one
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight great value
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first one so much I went back and ordered a second for a back up
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I start a lot of colts and need halters that won't break, I have a pile of these halters.
customer_reviews.author: WYCowboy65

customer_reviews.title: ... of this halter is held together by what looked like electrical tape
customer_reviews.text: The end of this halter is held together by what looked like electrical tape, which of course fell off within 24 hours. I replaced it with one that cost $10 more but has lasted for several months and still looks brand new (besides the dirt and horse snot!). One of those situations where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: Works on every size Horse Around
customer_reviews.text: This has been super handy from the biggest shires to the littlest ponies
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Thorne

customer_reviews.title: This Ranch uses these!
customer_reviews.text: This Ranch uses these! Nice halters. I’ve bought 2 and they work fine on my two year old mare!
customer_reviews.author: Sgitheanach

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rope halter for the price. Lots of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: 5 just because there was no sizing I got it for my quarter horse mix & its to big it like a sixe large but its very nice and sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this one a 3.5 just because there was no sizing I got it for my quarter horse mix & its to big it like a sixe large but its very nice and sturdy good quality I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: She said she loved it, quality rope halter
customer_reviews.text: Once again, my Granddaughter ordered this for her birthday Amazon card. She said she loved it, quality rope halter.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Nanc

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Fast shipping. A little stiff. Makes it hard to tie a good knot. Hopefully it softens over time.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Halter is stiff
customer_reviews.text: This halter is very stiff and hard to adjust and tie. It is breaking in, but still really stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Kayle

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff but good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff, but good quality. Some people may be looking for a stiffer 2 knot halter. This would be a good one. It is large enough to fit on many different sizes of horses. Over all good value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect halter for training purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I used a tutorial to adjust my rope halters to fit my wild donkeys and these rope halters have been just what I needed for training them how to lead and load into a trailer. I expect they will help with anything else I attempt to train them to do as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use when leading them in from the field
customer_reviews.text: the rope Halters are a great easy to use when going from field to barn, use of ferrier. Like the thickness of the rope
customer_reviews.author: G. Binney

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Nice rope, just the right size, and I love the color and have gotten several compliments on it already! I well order again when it's time, or when I just want to spruce up my boy's wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: sssteph

customer_reviews.title: Great halter!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great halter. No more metal on my horses faces and struggling with halters that don't fit. I can leave it on over his fly mask and not worry that it will harm his face in the summer sun like the halters made with metal.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Britt

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I've bought these same rope halters. They last a long time, quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johng

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Only bought it to use on a horse with a bad abscess on her jaw. Needed a cheap one that could be disposable if necessary. I put it in bleach water after using it every day for a couple of weeks and was able to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette

customer_reviews.title: High quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Halter has top quality craftsmanship and Great color designs. I highly recommend this to all who ride .
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Flex it a bit before use
customer_reviews.text: The rope is a bit stiff, I found if you flex it a bit it will be a lot easier to work with. After a few uses it's already getting softer and more pliable. Great halter, well-made and fit my Quarter cross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 days and the black tape that holds the ends together came off now its unraveling.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Rope was very stiff
customer_reviews.text: The price was so great I was hoping it would save me from buying another pricey one from Parelli, but no; the material was stiff and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well for our Arabian mare who is only 14 hands. It is loose but it can be adjusted. Good option, not for competitions but for relaxing it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Notorious BIG

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with this halter
customer_reviews.text: The knots fall out and the tips on the tie part fall off. I was disappointed with this halter
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Well-constructed with quality rope, works well, like the bright purple color. Fits my horse with a large nose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They fit well on all my horses. Not recommended for miniature horses or foals.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Butler

customer_reviews.title: ... wears a "horse" or "oversized bridle this halter fits great.
customer_reviews.text: If your horse wears a "horse" or "oversized bridle this halter fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great halter for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great halter for the price. The black rubber piece that keeps the two pieces of rope together at the end did fall off, but other than that I have no complaints. It fits my 17.1 appendix and the smaller horses at my barn (15hh,- 16hh). I would defiantly recommend this halter.
customer_reviews.author: Kano

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Its lasting for the price but a little too lose on my horse, might need a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed in this halter
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in this halter. The rope already came apart and starter fraying. Barely used it a handful of times
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Smith

customer_reviews.title: ordered for my daughter she likes the halter. She ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered for my daughter she likes the halter. She advised was stiff at first to use and if you have a horse with a large head it will be tight. Package arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best rope halter I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This product is such good quality for cheap. My horse loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Cogan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great halter, it is strong, it fits good and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price can't beat it it's well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: it is OK.
customer_reviews.text: I like this halter a lot. The plastic loop on the end came off after a few days. I am not happy about that. I guess I can tape it and or burn it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Good Halter, Bright Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice halter with a good color. Only complaint is the tip came off so the two small ropes that make the halter are split apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylynn Luscombe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Much less restricting for my horse.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit's my daughter's averaged sized QH well. Easy to put on, has held up beautifully. Color is exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: the4sides

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and spend the money for a good Double Diamond rope halter
customer_reviews.text: Knots weren't tight at all and the halter was incredibly stiff. I wouldn't put this on my horse ever. Do yourself a favor and spend the money for a good Double Diamond rope halter.
customer_reviews.author: Christabel

customer_reviews.title: I like this halter overall but it's not necessary to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this halter overall but it's not necessary to be so stiff. I needed a more pliable halter. Oh well. They're hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLady

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely way too huge, no way to even adjust the rope halter i received.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nice Halter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rope halter. It is exactly what I was looking for and the price could not be beat. I will use this as my main halter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan U.

customer_reviews.title: Thick rope
customer_reviews.text: Too thick, if you need it for training, not good
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Leclerc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Sir Harley is very handsome in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: The piece of plastic on the end of the two ropes came off way to easily. Now I have to thread two ropes to make the knot
customer_reviews.author: Brent Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great rope halter, came in perfect condition. It is a little stif and the knots arr a little loose, but overall it's awesome and should fit my 16 hand quarter mare well!
customer_reviews.author: J Nix

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter
customer_reviews.text: It ran a little large for my half-Arab mare, but it's a nice quality halter for the price. Great color and good materials.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Easy to fit to my horse's head, and it fits him well. And the color is very vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Bella Wehe

customer_reviews.title: Great halter
customer_reviews.text: Use it on my horse everyday and it’s awesome. Very sturdy and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Macy b

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter
customer_reviews.text: This was available at a steal of a price and arrived in no time at all. I plan to order two more in pink!
customer_reviews.author: Horsemama

customer_reviews.title: large enough
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for my 16 hand gelding who has a big head
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kumler

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this halter fits my quarter horse nicely he's a medium normally! But this halter has extra so could fit a large horse to! I thought it was going to be cheaply made but it's got thick rope and good knots I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea

customer_reviews.title: rope a bit thick, but works well
customer_reviews.text: The rope is a bit stiff and thick, but serves it purpose
customer_reviews.author: H. B. D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice halter for the price, my daughter loves it on her horse.
customer_reviews.author: Talitha H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The halter looks exactly like the picture show and was super easy to put on my horse! Absoultely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This halter is not well made. It faded very fast, did not fit well. I went ahead and bought a Parelli halter, was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Recommend it for horses that pop their regular halters.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter, I wanted one without knots over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice halter, I wanted one without knots over the bridge of their nose to use when leaving them in the round pen for the day. The halter does run large, my horses are mustangs that have larger heads and I did have to re-tie the knots to lower the side knots so the tie wasn't at the top of their neck. Nylon is also easy to get the mud off in winter. Works well for both the gelding and mare.
customer_reviews.author: Spinladytwo

customer_reviews.title: Nice halter
customer_reviews.text: the tied halter is pretty nice! Actually the only complaint is that it seems a bit large, but you can always tighten the knots to make it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Prinnysmom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rubber end cap on ties came off within the first day of using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rope halter I have ever seen! The quality is amazing. Well worth the money! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Korey Grennon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright vibrant pink! My horses love it. It's just like the picture and is well made .
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Soderberg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to fit. Horse seems comfortable and it works for what is needed.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Lindsey Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent halter
customer_reviews.text: I like these rope halter's because they don't take up very much room in my pack. And the strong enough to keep a horse from getting away in a thunderstorm.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this looks so great on my mare . Its so bright and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lepore

product_meta.title: Tough 1 Horse Poly Rope Tied Halter
product_meta.description: Best selling two tone poly nylon rope halters are fully adjustable and designed to fit snugly. Throat knot should touch the horse's throat latch; ropes from that knot to the crown should come up behind the jaw bone.
feature_bullets: Poly nylon rope halters are fully adjustable
Throat knot should touch the horse's throat latch
Ropes from that knot to the crown should come up behind the jaw bone
